
### caller-saved registers  {.smaller}


* functions <em>may</em> freely <em>trash</em> these 

* return value register <code>%rax</code>
* argument registers: <br> 

   * <code>%rdi</code>, <code>%rsi</code>, <code>%rdx</code>, <code>%rcx</code>, <code>%r8</code>, <code>%r9</code>

* %r11
* MMX/SSE/AVX registers: <code>%xmm0-15</code>, etc.
* floating point stack: <code>%st(0)-%st(7)</code>
* condition codes (used by <code>jne</code>, etc.)


### callee-saved registers 


* functions <em>must preserve</em> these 

* <code>%rsp</code> (stack pointer), <code>%rbp</code> (frame pointer, maybe)
* <code>%r12-%r15</code>


### caller/callee-saved  {.smaller}

<!-- \lstset{style=small} -->
 
```
foo:
    pushq %r12 // r12 is caller-saved
    ... use r12 ...
    popq %r12
    ret

...
other_function:
    pushq %r11 // r11 is caller-saved
    ...
    callq foo
    popq %r11
```
